title: Ultra-thin order–disorder CeO2 nanobelts as the non-carbon support of the PtCu catalyst towards methanol oxidation and oxygen reduction reactions
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00449C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Han Zhi, Boda Dong, Xingxing Guo, Feng Xu
By using the ultra-thin CeO2 nanobelts (2D-CeO2) with order–disordered structure as the non-carbon support, the PtCu/2D-CeO2 catalyst exhibits outstanding MOR and ORR activities.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
